publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1685 Brian Adam: Concessionary Fare Cards—That the Parliament calls upon local authorities to abolish any administration charges that they make for concessionary fare cards. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*
S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Michael Russell*, Irene McGugan*, Fiona McLeod*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Alex Salmond*

S1M-1685 Brian Adam: Concessionary Fare Cards—That the Parliament calls upon local authorities to abolish any administration charges that they make for concessionary fare cards. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Alex Salmond
S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1685 Brian Adam: Concessionary Fare Cards—That the Parliament calls upon local authorities to abolish any administration charges that they make for concessionary fare cards. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Alex Salmond, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani

S1M-1685 Concessionary Fare Cards (lodged on 20 February 2001) Kay Ullrich*

S1M-1685 Brian Adam: Concessionary Fare Cards—That the Parliament calls upon local authorities to abolish any administration charges that they make for concessionary fare cards. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Alex Salmond, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani, Kay Ullrich

Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Alex Salmond, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani, Kay Ullrich, Ms Margo MacDonald
